segment.source: How to use the Feature Selection page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to choose which parts of the setup processes and Internet Explorer 11 to change for your company.
segment.target: How to use the Feature Selection page in the IEAK 11 Customization Wizard to choose which parts of the setup processes and Internet Explorer 11 to change for your company.

segment.source: Use the Feature Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)
segment.target: Use the Feature Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard (Internet Explorer Administration Kit 11 for IT Pros)

segment.source: Use the Feature Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard
segment.target: Use the Feature Selection page in the IEAK 11 Wizard

segment.source: The Feature Selection page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you choose which parts of the setup processes and Internet Explorer 11 to change for your company, including:
segment.target: The Feature Selection page of the Internet Explorer Customization Wizard 11 lets you choose which parts of the setup processes and Internet Explorer 11 to change for your company, including:

segment.source: Setup Customizations.
segment.target: Setup Customizations.

segment.source: Lets you add custom components, decide which components to install, provide your download site information, and modify the Setup title bar and graphics.
segment.target: Lets you add custom components, decide which components to install, provide your download site information, and modify the Setup title bar and graphics.

segment.source: Internal Install.
segment.target: Internal Install.

segment.source: Lets you decide to install the latest updates, run the malicious Software Removal Tool, and set IE11 as the default browser.
segment.target: Lets you decide to install the latest updates, run the malicious Software Removal Tool, and set IE11 as the default browser.

segment.source: Connection Manager.
segment.target: Connection Manager.

segment.source: Lets you import your Connection Manager Profiles, created by the Connection Manager Administration Kit (CMAK).
segment.target: Lets you import your Connection Manager Profiles, created by the Connection Manager Administration Kit (CMAK).

segment.source: Browser User Interface.
segment.target: Browser User Interface.

segment.source: Lets you change the toolbar buttons, the title bar, and the general look of the browser.
segment.target: Lets you change the toolbar buttons, the title bar, and the general look of the browser.

segment.source: Search Providers.
segment.target: Search Providers.

segment.source: Lets you add, remove, and pick a new default search provider for IE11.
segment.target: Lets you add, remove, and pick a new default search provider for IE11.

segment.source: Important URLs – Home Page and Support.
segment.target: Important URLs – Home Page and Support.

segment.source: Lets you choose multiple Home pages that open in different tabs in IE.
segment.target: Lets you choose multiple Home pages that open in different tabs in IE.

segment.source: You can also use this page to change the Welcome and Online Support pages.
segment.target: You can also use this page to change the Welcome and Online Support pages.

segment.source: Accelerators.
segment.target: Accelerators.

segment.source: Lets you import, add, edit, or remove Accelerators, the contextual services that give you quick access to external services from any webpage.
segment.target: Lets you import, add, edit, or remove Accelerators, the contextual services that give you quick access to external services from any webpage.

segment.source: Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds.
segment.target: Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds.

segment.source: Lets you pick which favorites, web slices, and feeds are installed with your custom installation package.
segment.target: Lets you pick which favorites, web slices, and feeds are installed with your custom installation package.

segment.source: Browsing Options.
segment.target: Browsing Options.

segment.source: Lets you pick how you delete items in the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds folders, and whether to add the Microsoft default items.
segment.target: Lets you pick how you delete items in the Favorites, Favorites Bar, and Feeds folders, and whether to add the Microsoft default items.

segment.source: Compatibility View.
segment.target: Compatibility View.

segment.source: Lets you decide whether IE renders content using compatibility mode or standards mode.
segment.target: Lets you decide whether IE renders content using compatibility mode or standards mode.

segment.source: Connections Customization.
segment.target: Connections Customization.

segment.source: Lets you set up and deploy custom connections.
segment.target: Lets you set up and deploy custom connections.

segment.source: Security Zones and Content Ratings.
segment.target: Security Zones and Content Ratings.

segment.source: Lets you control what your employees can view and what’s downloaded to their computer.
segment.target: Lets you control what your employees can view and what’s downloaded to their computer.

segment.source: Programs.
segment.target: Programs.

segment.source: Lets you pick the default program that’s used automatically by email, HTML, newsgroups, Internet calls, calendars, and contact lists.
segment.target: Lets you pick the default program that’s used automatically by email, HTML, newsgroups, Internet calls, calendars, and contact lists.

segment.source: Additional Settings.
segment.target: Additional Settings.

segment.source: Lets you pre-set and lockdown specific functionality on your employee’s computer.
segment.target: Lets you pre-set and lockdown specific functionality on your employee’s computer.

segment.source: Note
segment.target: Note

segment.source: Your choices on this page determine what wizard pages appear.
segment.target: Your choices on this page determine what wizard pages appear.

segment.source: To use the Feature Selection page
segment.target: To use the Feature Selection page

segment.source: Check the box next to each feature you want to include in your custom installation package.
segment.target: Check the box next to each feature you want to include in your custom installation package.

segment.source: You can also click Select All to add, or Clear All to remove, all of the features.
segment.target: You can also click Select All to add, or Clear All to remove, all of the features.

segment.source: Click Next to go to the Automatic Version Synchronization page or Back to go to the Package Type Selection page.
segment.target: Click Next to go to the Automatic Version Synchronization page or Back to go to the Package Type Selection page.
